name: Operation Babel: New Tokyo Legacy / 東京新世録 オペレーションバベル
description: When a mysterious object—dubbed ‘the Embryo’—appears in the sky, the CPA and the Xth Squad are mobilized to face the new threat. Customize your characters with the innovative 'Sub-Blood' system, form your perfect team, and venture into deadly labyrinths to challenge the invaders!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10/8.1/7 Processor: Core i3-2100 3.10 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 8600 GT DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 6 GB available space Sound Card: Onboard
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10/8.1/7 Processor: Core i3-6100 3.70 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 Ti DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 6 GB available space Sound Card: Onboard
